content: AnnalisaMassini < Users < TWiki Tags: tag this topic create new tag view all tags Annalisa Massini Home Page Associate Professor Dipartimento di Informatica Universit� di Roma "La Sapienza" Viale Regina Elena 295, 00161 Roma Italy telefono: 06-49255427 e-mail: massini@diNOSPAM.uniroma1.it Short CV - 1989 Degree in Mathematics, the University of Rome 'La Sapienza' - 1993 Ph.D. in Computer Science, University of Rome 'La Sapienza' - 1996-2001 Assistant Professor, Computer Science Department, University of Rome 'La Sapienza' - since november 2001 Associate Professor, Computer Science Department, University of Rome 'La Sapienza' CV * Curriculum Vitae - in english - July 2025     * Curriculum Vitae - in italiano - luglio 2025 Research interests Mobile sensor networks, Interconnection networks, Hybrid systems verification, Parallel computing, Computer arithmetic, Graph drawing Publications DBLP     Google Scholar     Publications Teaching List of courses Progettazione di Sistemi digitali (ex Architettura degli Elaboratori I) Architettura degli Elaboratori (ex Architettura degli Elaboratori II) Intensive Computation - Calcolo Intensivo Thesis Bachelor and Master Theses - Tesi di Laurea e Tirocini Hours appointment by e-mail -- AnnalisaMassini Edit | Attach | Watch | Print version | History: r43 < r42 < r41 < r40 < r39 | Backlinks | Raw View | Raw edit | More topic actions Topic revision: r43 - 2025-07-27 - AnnalisaMassini Log In or Register Users Web ...
